fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.batteries

Interface BatteriesImplementationI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BatteriesCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Batteries, BatteriesConnector, BatteriesInboundPort, BatteriesOutboundPort

    public interface BatteriesImplementationI
    The interface BatteriesImplementationI defines the signatures of operations that can be performed by batteries components.

    Description

    Invariants

     invariant       POWER_UNIT != null
 invariant       TENSION_UNIT != null
 invariant       CAPACITY_UNIT != null
 invariant       STANDARD_NOMINAL_CAPACITY != null && STANDARD_NOMINAL_CAPACITY.getData() > 0.0 && STANDARD_NOMINAL_CAPACITY.getMeasurementUnit().equals(CAPACITY_UNIT)
 invariant       !(areCharging() && areDischarging())

    Created on : 2025-09-25

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MeasurementUnit CAPACITY_UNIT
      capacity measurement unit for the batteries.
      static MeasurementUnit POWER_UNIT
      measurement unit for power used in the batteries.
      static MeasurementUnit TENSION_UNIT
      measurement unit for tension used in the batteries.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean areCharging()
      return true if the batteries are currently charging and false otherwise.
      boolean areDischarging()
      return true if the batteries are currently discharging and false otherwise.
      SignalData<java.lang.Double> chargeLevel()
      return current charge level of the batteries in proportion of the current capacity.
      SignalData<java.lang.Double> currentCapacity()
      return the current capacity of the batteries.
      SignalData<java.lang.Double> getCurrentPowerConsumption()
      return the current power consumption of the batteries when charging, otherwise they do not consume power.
      static boolean invariants(BatteriesImplementationI instance)
      return true if the invariants are observed, false otherwise.
      Measure<java.lang.Double> nominalCapacity()
      return the nominal capacity of the batteries in AmpH.
      void startCharging()
      start charging the batteries.
      void stopCharging()
      stop charging the batteries.
